title: Indonesia protests explained: why did they start and how has the government responded?
description: Anger at perks for politicians spilled over into wider protests after the death of a 21-year-old delivery driver in Jakarta
content:
At least seven people have died, hundreds have been injured and public buildings have been burnt and looted after thousands of people took to the streets in anti-government protests across Indonesia over the past week.

title: Dances With Wolves star Graham Greene dies aged 73
description: The legendary Canadian actor was also known for his roles in The Green Mile and Maverick.
content:

title: US Open 2025: Jannik Sinner labelled an 'AI' player after thrashing Alexander Bublik in New York
description: World number one Jannik Sinner is labelled an "artificial intelligence" player by opponent Alexander Bublik after a rapid US Open win.
content:
Jannik Sinner was labelled an "artificial intelligence" player by opponent Alexander Bublik after the defending US Open champion ruthlessly raced into the quarter-finals.

title: Graham Greene, Dances with Wolves actor, dies aged 73
description: The trailblazing Canadian First Nations actor, who was nominated for an Academy Award, died in Toronto after a long illness
content:
Graham Greene, the prolific Oscar-nominated Canadian First Nations actor and Hollywood trailblazer, has died aged 73 in a Toronto hospital after a long illness.
“He was a great man of morals, ethics and character and will be eternally missed,” Greene... [2490 chars]
